Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/St.Louis
ShortDescription: WB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/St.Louis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/St.Louis.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Roosevelt.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
